Dialogue.Page: Hello there. People call me Streetlights. That’s not my real name.
I made The Outsider mod, I guess. But working on it gave me TRAUMA, which my doctor Jaru says makes me psychopathic and genocidal. But only in some timelines.
Currently, I’m making a game called Protostellar, which contains microtonal music, queer furry characters, and megastructures.
Have a wonderful day. Or, at least, don’t forget to try to sometimes.
